# 0. Setup
```{r setup}

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
# library(yourpackage)  # <- add your package here

indicator_name <- "Example Indicator"
source_data <- "https://example.com/data.csv"
```

# 1. Data Acquisition
```{r}
raw <- read_csv(source_data)

```


# 2. Data Cleaning
```{r}
cleaned <- raw |>
  janitor::clean_names()

```


# 3. Standard Data Prep
```{r}
prepared <- data_prep(cleaned)
```



# 4. Analysis
```{r}
result <- prepared |>
  summarize(...)

```


# 5. Outputs
```{r}
write_csv(result, "results/example_indicator.csv")
```

This is not the final plot but a way to metric.
